author: admin
title: Political chaos: Shettima deals blows on Borno lawmaker, denies 2019 claims - NAIJ.COM
text: Political chaos: Shettima deals blows on Borno lawmaker, denies 2019 claims - NAIJ.COM NAIJ.COM Following earlier claims by Danlami Kubo, the Deputy Speaker of Borno House of Assembly, suggesting that Kashim Shettima, should be the next man to rule Nigeria at the end of President Muhammadu Buhariâ€™s tenure, the Borno state governor has reacted.
